name: Remove from array
description:
Use the correct Array method to remove the last item of the fruits array.

var fruits = ["Banana", "Orange", "Apple"];
taskQuestions: Describe how this is better than a for method
Describe how you would make it reusable to extract any given index on the array

name: Add to array
description:
Use the correct Array method to add item to the fruits array.

var fruits = ["Banana", "Orange", "Apple"]; var item="kiwi"
taskQuestions: Describe how this is better than a for method
